lead_paragraph: GOLDSMITH--Marilyn. November 28, 1926, on April 6, 2014. Beloved wife of the late Will Goldsmith. James Madison HS, LIU (BA, MA, Teacher). Award-winning poet. Taproot, Performance Poets Assoc., L.I. Writers Guild. Lovingly remembered: Nancy, George, Steve, Kate, Lauren, Dan, Rafaella, Eli, Sarah, Lydia, Hannah. Donations: Marilyn Goldsmith Poetry Award c/o James Madison H.S., 3787 Bedford Ave., Brooklyn, NY 11229.
